name: Kalima
intro: Blockchain solution for Internet of Things (IoT) services
introduce: Kalima is a blockchain solution for Internet of Things (IoT) services allows companies to independently and securely monetize and manage enterprise data. The Kalima main chain is the primary operations hub with various enterprise private and industry public blockchains linking operations. Businesses, developers, and individual users can create their own decentralized applications to manage IoT data.
